Welcome to eduMRIsim's documentation!
=====================================

eduMRIsim is an educational MRI simulator software application.

Check out :doc:`dependencies` for the required dependencies to run eduMRIsim.

.. note:: 
      This project is under active development.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
